org.ow2.play.commons.accesscontrol

Class AccessImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ow2.play.commons.accesscontrol.AccessImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Access

    public class AccessImpl
extends Object
implements Access
    This class fetches permission data from a Web Service and validates permissions based on such ACL information.
    Author:
    Roland St√ºhmer

      • AccessImpl

        public AccessImpl(org.ontoware.rdf2go.model.Model permissions)
           throws AccessManagementException
        A contructor where a pre-exisiting Model containing permissions can be supplied. This constructor does not connect to a PLAY service, useful e.g., in Unit Testing.
        Throws:
        AccessManagementException
